response.overview: Emma, a self-made, country girl, has escaped a difficult life, and now works in the city. Life takes a turn for Emma, when she misidentifies handsome stranger William and is forced to marry him , unaware, that William is the CEO of Irving Corporation. Both William and Emma hope to get a divorce soon after, but sparks begin to fly when they move in together. To admit their love for each other and save Irving Corporation from falling into the wrong hands, Emma and William must tackle several obstacles and villains standing in the way of their blossoming romance.
response.title: Country Gal to CEO's Bride
